section.title: osquery: Sending log messages to osquery's syslog-ng table
section.para: The osquery() driver sends log messages to osquery's syslog-ng table.

The syslog-ng table contains logs forwarded over a named pipe from syslog-ng. When an osquery process that supports the syslog-ng table starts up, it creates (and properly sets permissions for) a named pipe for syslog-ng to write to.
